div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 658 Furculesti, c. 21 km. SW of Alex- andria, Rumania, 1958 Burial: after 70 B.C. Contents: 49 AR Dyrrhachium: 40 dr. incl. 1 imit. Geto-Dacian: 8 tetradr. and didr. Imit.Roman Rep.: 1 den. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) Iliescu, Caiet selectiv 2 (1961), pp. 658, 662-70
